author: geistag
title: few parts but a lot of fun!
review:
I bought this set especially for the radiator grill,however i found out that it is great fun to play with. If you pulll it back all the way, it will tilt backwards and continue to ride on it's spoiler which amazingly still keeps it in a pretty straight line! The stickers look great (although I did not apply them,as I needed the peaces clean for other builds) and you also get a few cool parts such as the grill,exhaust intake, back wheels and of course the pull back motor.

The only dissapointing aspect for me was the fact that it has just a few pieces (quite a few less than even the other power racers).
